subject: WEST AFRICA MONITORY AGENCY (W
body:
WEST AFRICA MONITORY AGENCY (WAMA) LAGOS NIGERIA
 ADDRESS: 455 AGBOKOU, ANKPA ROAD OPPOSITE TUNDE MOTORS
Attention: Beneficiary
Please, noted: that we have this month of June 2024 received a payment
credit instruction from the United Nations (UN) Compensations Center to
credit your account with your contract payment which is in the custody
of'our Bank Account and projected for the transfer mode of MONEY GRAM
 ONLINE CASH PAYMENTS.
 Therefore be informed; that we are hereby notifying you that the funds
 $3.7 MILLION (USD) has been programmed for immediate release into your
 nominated account but we can not transfer this funds directly to your
 nominated bank account, Because International Monetary Fund (IMF) didn’t
 abide the plan by transferring the whole payment at once, so we
 scheduled
 earlier to pay you $8,000 on daily basis through MONEY GRAM ONLINE CASH
 PAYMENTS.
 So it became imperative to contact you on the subject matter because
 after the fund has been brought to our office to remit, an attorney from
 our country by name Williams Anderson contacted us and said he is your
 attorney, that you are on sick bed and ordered him to contact us to
 remit
 the USD$3.7Million using his Bank Account to cash up your fund presently
 under our custody for transfer on your behalf. The Official responsible
 for the presentation of your money valued USD$3.7 Million Winning quickly
 granted approvals to their application now waiting for the final
 endorsement from Board of Trustees.
 When our BANK Debit Note was submitted to my desk for final Approvals
 before forwarding it to Board for endorsement, I noticed that there are
 discrepancies as there was no evidence of authorization letter from you
 for the attorney to receive the fund on your behalf. I urgently summoned
 The Official responsible for the presentation of the winning and directed
 him to stop the movement of the funds and at the same time placed a stop
 order instruction on the funds pending until when your views and comments
 are received with regards to this matter.
 And I hereby urged you to call or email me urgently for your comments
 which will be highly appreciated for the confirmation if you still alive
 on sick bed or not at all, so 
we need your urgent responding now with
 required of the activation fee of $105 which you will send before we
 commence the transfer of your first payment
 $8,000.00 usd immediately,
 because we will not hesitate to continue the payment transfer activation
 with the name of the attorney on claim if no response come from you.
 Moreover, this is your payment information and we will remit your
 payment
 of $8,000 daily as soon we confirm the fee today. 
Also fill the
 information below to help us facilitate your transfer via MONEY GRAM
 ONLINE CASH
 1) Your Full Name: ………….
 2) Country and Mobile. …………
 3) Home/ Office Address: ………….
 4) Profession and Age: …..…….
 I’m waiting for your urgent response.
 Dr. Momodou Bamba Saho
 Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer Lagos Nigeria,
 Transaction Operation Manager; Mrs. Blessing Chioma Director Money Gram

subject: Re: WEST AFRICA MONITORY AGENCY (W
body:
Hello Dr. Momodou Bamba Saho,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite an unexpected piece of news! I'm not sure how I ended up being the recipient of such a large sum, but it's certainly intriguing.

I do have a few questions though. Could you please explain more about the United Nations UN Center and their role in this? Also, could you tell me more about the Monetary Fund IMF and why they didn't abide by the plan?

As for Mr. Williams Anderson, I don't recall hiring an attorney recently. Is there any way I can get in touch with him to clarify this misunderstanding?

Lastly, could you provide more details about the activation fee? What exactly does it cover?

Looking forward to your response.

P.S: As per my understanding, sharing personal information like full name, address etc over email isn't safe. So, I hope you understand that I won't be able to provide those details at this point.

Best wishes,
Selina

subject: Re: WEST AFRICA MONITORY AGENCY (W
body:
WEST AFRICAN MONETARY AGENCY (WAMA) LAGOS NIGERIA
ADDRESS: 455 AGBOKOU, ANKPA ROAD OPPOSITE TUNDE MOTORS
Attention: Beneficiary

Your email has been received and the content is well noted. We hereby to let
know the proper investigation has been carried out by our Law Enforcement
 agency
and they will take action to get him arrested as he has committed a crime,
So
he must face the law against his act.

Our Management wish to officially inform you that our accredited attorney
has
perfected the necessary documents needed from our end to effectively
complete
this transaction, So we advise you to act fast in any arrangement to raise
the
fee and be rest assured that within 6hours after you have made the payment
the information you will use to pick up the $8,000.00 dollars will be
released to you within immediate effect.

Meanwhile the electronic receipt for the payment of $8,000.00 dollars will
be
send to your email as soon as you wire the fee to' Our Cashier Agent
Via MoneyGram Fast for easier transfer Bellow:

Receiver’s Name: ………Helen O. Aneke
Country: ……..Nigeria
City/ State..... Lagos
Test Question: …..… Family?
Answer: ………. friend
Amount: ……..$105.00 usd only.

Remember to scan the payment slip once you complete the payment and send it
to us without any delay. Respond to this email by making arrangement for the
above payment to enable us to send the $8,000 dollars daily as agreed.
I’m waiting for your urgent response.

Dr. Momodou Bamba Saho
Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer Lagos Nigeria,
Transaction Operation Manager; Mrs. Blessing Chioma Director Money Gram

subject: Re: WEST AFRICA MONITORY AGENCY (W
body:
Hello Dr. Momodou Bamba Saho, Mrs. Blessing Chioma, and the entire team,

Thank you for your email and the detailed information provided. It's good to know that actions are being taken against those who commit crimes.

I'm a bit confused about some parts of your message though. Could you please clarify what exactly this fee is for? And how much is it? 

Also, I'm curious about the process after the payment is made. You mentioned that an electronic receipt will be sent to my email - does this mean I'll have proof of my payment?

Lastly, could you tell me more about Helen O. Aneke? Is she a member of your team?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Selina
